title: The Dark Side of Marriage
description: Could she bear to live a lie...?Karen hadn't seen Nick since their painful and bitter separation two years before, but he was still her husband. Now he had come back with an impossible request"You are coming to Dellersbeck to play the part of a loving wife as though nothing had ever come between us."How could she possibly live under the same roof as the man who despised her--hiding the fact that she still loved him?
author: Margery Hilton
